description: This is an artisan-crafted set of picks and torsion wrenches made from fine steel. Equipped with spring-tensioned tumbler mechanisms to ease lockpicking.
An advanced guide on topics that seem relevant to mechanical engineering, electrical engineering and chemistry. Often written in somewhat stilted 19th century prose.
This is an mechanical diaphragm assisted safecracking device. Place on the safe and use to your heart's content! For legal usage only

A miniature, steam engine.  An integrated boiler burns coal to heat water into steam, driving a reciprocating shaft.  A condenser recaptures the water, making this a closed cycle system. Commonly used in machined power armor or mechanized automatons.
